textBeforeTable: (Per Serving) Nutritional Information Ricotta Cream Cashew Cream Related Recipes: Serving suggestions are not included in the nutritional analysis. * If desired, Equal® Spoonful can be replaced by either 1-1/2 packets Equal®, or, 1 tablespoon granulated or brown sugar. 3) For a non-dairy topping, top with Cashew Cream or Ricotta Cream (see recipe links). 2) For a Coffee Mocha effect, top with light whipped cream. 1) For a Cappuccino effect, top with froth. Variations: Combine all ingredients in beverage mug until blended. Directions: 1/4 cup whipped heavy cream 2 Tbsp whole milk 1 Tbsp sugar 1 Tbsp cocoa powder, unsweetened 1 cup hot brewed coffee   Traditional Recipe 1/4 tsp almond extract 2 tsp unsweetened cocoa powder 1 Tbsp Equal® Spoonful * 1 cup strongly brewed hot coffee   Recipe Makeover Chocolate Almond Coffee slims the traditional Coffee Mocha's calories, fat and added sugars by eliminating the whole milk, whipped cream and sugar, and replacing them with lighter ingredients. Beverages: Non Dairy-Based
